resources.string: Make sure both name inputs have been filled
1. Move by selecting the piece you\'d like to move and select one of the highlighted squares to move it there.
2. Each piece must move diagonally on dark squares of the board.
3. If the opponent\'s checker is adjacent to yours, and the next square in that direction is empty, then you can jump over that piece and capture it.
4. Once you\'ve finished your turn, press the done button.
5. If you\'d like to concede or have run out of pieces, press the resign button.
6. Once a piece reaches the opposite edge of the board, they become a king and can move forwards or backwards diagonally.
7. Select a piece by pressing it for the possible moves. Deselect it by pressing it again.
